The Birth Story of Pañcuposathaka the Dove
“You’re relaxed now, dove,
but you’re not out of danger, bird.
Enduring hunger and thirst,
why do you observe the poṣadha, dove?”
“Formerly, I was infatuated with a dove,
and we both enjoyed ourselves in this place.
Then a fowler caught the dove,
and I was unwilling to be without her.
Because of separation from her in different existences,
I experience a mental feeling.
Therefore I observe the poṣadha,
so that passion may not come to me again.”
